The module exmpp_socket manages TCP/IP socket connections to an XMPP server with or without TLS/SSL encryption.

Authors: Emilio Bustos (emilionicolas@gmail.com).

Description

The module exmpp_socket manages TCP/IP socket connections to an XMPP server with or without TLS/SSL encryption.

This module is intended to be used directly by client developers.
